Instance Property# dataSource

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
var dataSource: any MPSCNNConvolutionDataSource { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/datasource#see-also)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/datasource#Instance-Properties)

[`var inputFeatureChannels: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/inputfeaturechannels)The number of feature channels per pixel in the input image.[`var outputFeatureChannels: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/outputfeaturechannels)The number of feature channels per pixel in the output image.[`var groups: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/groups)The number of groups that the input and output channels are divided into.[`var subPixelScaleFactor: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/subpixelscalefactor)[`var neuron: MPSCNNNeuron?`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/neuron)The neuron filter to be applied as part of the convolution operation.[`class MPSCNNNeuron`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneuron)A filter that applies a neuron activation function.[`var neuronType: MPSCNNNeuronType`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/neurontype)Deprecated[`enum MPSCNNNeuronType`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype)The types of neuron filter to append to a convolution.[`var neuronParameterA: Float`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/neuronparametera)Deprecated[`var neuronParameterB: Float`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/neuronparameterb)Deprecated[`var accumulatorPrecisionOption: MPSNNConvolutionAccumulatorPrecisionOption`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/accumulatorprecisionoption)[`var channelMultiplier: Int`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/channelmultiplier)[`var fusedNeuronDescriptor: MPSNNNeuronDescriptor?`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/fusedneurondescriptor)[`var neuronParameterC: Float`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnconvolution/neuronparameterc)Deprecated
